title: Please do not click those Christmas links
body:
One of my friends sent it to me but luckily I didn't click it. Those links just want to steal your information and do not work at all please save yourself time by blocking or reporing those people who send them to you.


~Krimsonic

replies.body: Pretty much, if you do not see it on the main webpage or on the main client page, ignore it.

Agreed! If you see **any links** advertising anything for free, stay away! This is a very common technique to phish your account information and take it from you.

https://m.popkey.co/10654e/y6qA7.gif
